actions: Drains Heat, purges accumulations, transforms Dampness, promotes urination, invigorates the Blood and dispels Blood Stasis.
Drains Damp-Heat especially from the Lower Jiao.
Promotes the movement of Qi, alleviates pain, adjusts and regulates stagnant Qi in the Intestines, dispels Damp-Heat and harmonizes the Liver and Spleen.
Promotes the movement of Qi, reduces distention and pressure and resolves hardenings.

syndromes: Damp-Heat in the Liver and Gallbladder

symptoms: Palpable pain in the Gallbladder region
Dry mouth with a bitter taste
Thirst with no desire to drink
If heat is Internal, only fever
There may be Yang jaundice that is bright and sometimes itches
manifestations.tongueCoat: Greasy and yellow or Dry and yellow (more Heat)
manifestations.pulse: Wiry, slippery and rapid or Rolling and rapid
